description: Pasties made with easy to find ingredients.
name: Mini Pasties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a pan on medium heat. Add carrots, onion, celery, potato and salt. Cook until vegetables soften.
Add garlic, rosemary, parsley, paprika and peas. Mix well.
Add mince and allow to brown. In that same pan move everything to one side of the pan.
On the empty side of the pan add the butter and flour. Mix well until the butter melts and the flour turns a light brown.
Add in the pepper and the stock and mix everything. Allow it to simmer for a further 5 to 7 minutes until the mixture thickens. Allow to cool before filling your pastry.
Cut each sheet of puff pastry into 4 squares.
In each quarter, place 2 tbs of filling, then fold in a triangular shape and press the edges together. Pinch the edges into a pattern.
Place pasties onto a baking tray, brush with egg white for a shiny finish and sprinkle some sesame seeds on top.
Bake for 20 minutes or until golden.
